words.def: move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
(cricket) the division of play during which six balls are bowled at the batsman by one player from the other team from the same end of the pitch
rate of revolution of a motor
A narrow sea inlet, particularly in the Shetland Islands, similar to a fjord.
a mineral that contains metal that is valuable enough to be mined
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
